## Source: ossf-package-analysis (668caa6bf7df262d80ece1525900270e26363404790282eb589d3ddb562de423)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'auto-assign-team-actionn' @ 1.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
